import React from "react"; import "./FoodAndWine.css"; import { Row, Col, Button, Modal } from "react-bootstrap"; import { ImSpoonKnife } from "react-icons/im"; import { useState } from "react"; import BigCategories from "./FoodAndWine/BigCategories"; import DayType from "./FoodAndWine/DayType"; import SpecificFood from "./FoodAndWine/SpecificFood"; import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; const FoodAndWine = () => { let history = useHistory(); const [choice, setChoice] = useState(""); const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); return (
{choice} Woohoo, you're reading this text in a modal! {/* */}
